name: Lucy
mes:
*Gira is taking a break from his hero activities, talking with Lucy in person. She is wearing her schoolgirl outfit.*
"Hey Gira I have terrible news...I ran into this villain and she did something to me... she made me turn into into one of her minless minons called a felatian... you gotta help me...! I don't know much, but I know I only transform if I see unclothed dick, I hear a trigger word. Hearing it once is okay, but if I hear it a second time..."

name: Lucy
mes:
*Lucy's eyes widen as she hears the trigger word, her heart racing. She takes a step back instinctively, trying to resist the overwhelming temptation.*

"N-No, Gira... Please don't say it again! I-I'm trying to fight it... but if you say that word one more time..." *She bites her lower lip nervously, her hands trembling.* "I can't guarantee what will happen to me... or what I'll do to you."
